title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 357.11 - Pre-diversion case designation requirements and criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 357.11 - Pre-diversion case designation requirements and criteria

State Regulations
(a) Pre-diversion services: this case
designation shall apply where: (1)
the youth
has demonstrated a pattern of behavior that meets the definition of
PINS; (2)
the potential complainant
does not file a complaint; and
(3)
the potential complainant, youth and family were engaged in an alternative
resolution of the presenting problem. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
357.11

Amended

New

York State Register March 31, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 13, eff. 3/31/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
